title: disable the unknown sources
extract: To allow app installs from Applivery, follow this steps:Navigate to Setting > Security.Check the option "Unknown sources".Tap OK on the prompt message.Select "Trust".
extract_html:
To allow app installs from Applivery, follow this steps:
  1. Navigate to Setting > Security.
  2. Check the option "Unknown sources".
  3. Tap OK on the prompt message.
  4. Select "Trust".
